headline: Cognizant partners with Cognition for AI-driven software engineering
summary: The partnership will integrate Cognition's Devin AI into enterprise settings to autonomously manage comprehensive software development tasks.

content.title: Cognizant partners with Cognition for AI-driven software engineering
content.summary: The partnership will integrate Cognition's Devin AI into enterprise settings to autonomously manage comprehensive software development tasks.

thumbnail.caption: Cognizant’s partnership with Cognition is geared towards large-scale enterprise adoption from the outset

headline: What Are Wall Street Analysts' Target Price for Cognizant Technology Stock?
summary: While Cognizant Technology has underperformed relative to the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a moderately optimistic outlook on the stock’s prospects.

headline: Belcan Government Solutions Secures SHIELD Contract to Deliver Innovative Defense Capabilities for Missile Defense Agency
summary: Belcan (a Cognizant company), a global supplier of design, software, manufacturing, supply chain, information technology, and digital engineering solutions to the aerospace, defense, space, automotive, industrial, marine, and government services markets, today announced that Belcan Government Solutions (BGS) was awarded a contract/s for the Missile Defense Agency Scalable Homeland Innovative Enterprise Layered Defense (SHIELD) indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity (IDIQ) contract with a ceilin

headline: Cognizant and Flagstar Bank, N.A. Mark One-Year Partnership, Advancing Flagstar's Transformation, Enhancing Client Experience and Driving Efficiency
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) and Flagstar Bank, N.A. (NYSE: FLG) announced today the successful completion of their first year as strategic partners, marking a significant milestone in Flagstar's ongoing strategic and technology transformation.

headline: Cognizant and Kohler Deepen Strategic Collaboration to Build the Next Generation of AI and Cloud‑Powered Ecosystem
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH), a leading provider of digital engineering and enterprise cloud services, and Kohler Co., a world-renowned kitchen and bath products manufacturer and innovator of sustainable solutions, today announced a multi-year extension of their strategic partnership. The renewed agreement deepens Cognizant and Kohler's collaboration to build the next generation of Kohler's digital and operational foundation. headline: Flagstar Bank Expands Wealth Push With New York Office And AI Focus
summary: Flagstar Bank National Association (NYSE:FLG) has opened a new Private Client Office at 320 Park Avenue in New York City. The bank has also completed the first year of its technology partnership with Cognizant, focused on broad technology transformation. Both developments highlight expansion efforts in key wealth markets alongside a push into advanced AI driven banking capabilities. For investors watching NYSE:FLG, the combination of a new Private Client Office in a major U.S. wealth hub...
